text:
Hi  everybody,

was just setting up a new project based on the boilerplate repo and was playing around with the the HubSpot cli mode “draft” (as in `hs watch --mode=draft source_dir target_dir` ).

I don’t really get what the advantage of the “draft” mode is as I can’t see any of the CSS changes I make locally using “draft” mode in any preview (neither in the website page preview nor in the template preview available in the design manager).

I can see the changes in the design manager, but they don’t take effect in any preview until I publish them. So what’s the point?

Appreciate any input, thanks….
Lawrence
